title: Why my Picture doesn
content: I uploaded my picture recently in the profile section but it doesn
author: rs_donsata

comments.content: Ok, it has already shown up, hope not to unnecesary use of the threads again.

But, in the meantime, stopping the president would help   
   
M

Yours is nice too matha... i watched the twilight last weekend.   
   
...a nightmare shared by the latin american poor ones. Has any one felt just like Winston Smith when watching tv news??

I haven't got a TV (on purpose) but I feel like Winston Smith anyway.   
   
But rememeber, Big Brother doesn't exist. Behind every stupid president there are lots of clever civil servants.   
   
Matha.

Which is exactly why merely getting rid of a puppet actually makes things _worse_, by distracting from the necessary deep solution. For example, giving the people a "choice" between voting Democrat or Republican makes the deception that much more effective.   
   
And you know what really great?   
 [http://abcnews.go.com/sections/world/CSM/culture\_030421\_csm.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020191202/http:/abcnews.go.com/sections/world/CSM/culture_030421_csm.html)   
"The broadcasts will include two hours of original news plus 3
_At issue in this cultural campaign is whether Western-style democracy_

Maybe Big Brother does exist after all. Check this out:   
   
 [http://www.samizdata.net/blog/archives/002285.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020191202/http:/www.samizdata.net/blog/archives/002285.html)   
   
M.
I read once that US masses are moved by fear. Isn

If the US was Muslim:   
 ![cocafaith.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020191202im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/9081.jpg)   
   
hhp

Nice one Hrant. But I reckon this would be more fashionable:   
   
 ![mecca cola](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020191202im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/9084.jpg)   
   
Matha

I've got some news.   
The league table for international beer drinking has just been revised:   
   
1. The Czechs   
2. The Irish   
3. The Germans   
   
Thanks to complicated new rules about returning empty beer bottles to the store you bought your booze in, the Germans have dropped down 2 places and the Irish are now number 2.   
   
 ![guinness](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020191202im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/9088.jpg)   
   
Matha

Wow, now I'm craving a Guiness!!   
   
Good news? If you were Armenian, you'd agree that Turkey's misadventure with US foreign policy is simply wonderful!   
   
hhp

I thought it was wonderful because it pissed off Bush. I didn't think about the Armenian dimension.   
   
I've progressed in Turkish.   
I can now say "I am a psycopath" and "I am a sofa".   
   
M
